class.name: BoxShape4D
class.description: BoxShape4D describes a 4D box using a [member size] as a [Vector4]. The box is centered at the origin, and is axis-aligned by default; if you want a box facing a different direction, you can rotate the [CollisionShape4D] node the box is attached to.

members.member: The half extents, also known as just "extents", of the box in meters. This is the "radius" of the box. This is a wrapper around [member size] for situations where you want to use the extents instead of size.
The size of the box in meters. This is the "diameter" of the box. This is the value that is stored internally.
